scripts.dev: powershell -Command "& { netstat -ano | findstr ':3000' | ForEach-Object { $p = $_.Split() | Where-Object { $_ -match '^\d+$' } | Select-Object -Last 1; if ($p) { taskkill /F /PID $p 2>$null } }; netstat -ano | findstr ':5173' | ForEach-Object { $p = $_.Split() | Where-Object { $_ -match '^\d+$' } | Select-Object -Last 1; if ($p) { taskkill /F /PID $p 2>$null } }; Start-Job -ScriptBlock { cd backend; npm start } | Out-Null; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; cd frontend; npm run dev }"
